content.content: I have many items in my cart and want to clear out everything except for the electric toothbrush. Please remove the other items and place the order.

To fulfill your request, I will first clear the cart, then I will add the electric toothbrush back to the cart, and finally, I will proceed to checkout.

Here is the structured Python code to perform these actions:

```python
# Clear all items from the cart
clear_cart_response = clear_cart()

# Add the electric toothbrush back to the cart. 
# Assuming the product ID for the electric toothbrush is known and needs to be specified.
# Please replace 'TOOTHBRUSH_ID' with the actual product ID of the electric toothbrush.
cart_add_product_response = cart_add_product('TOOTHBRUSH_ID', 1)

# Proceed to checkout for the electric toothbrush.
checkout_response = checkout_selected_cart(['TOOTHBRUSH_ID'], None)
``` 

Please replace `'TOOTHBRUSH_ID'` with the actual product ID of the electric toothbrush in your cart.
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.
